data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Katlav, Alihan, Hajiqanbar, Hamidreza, Talebi, Ali Asghar (2015): Pseudopygmephorellus mazandaranicus sp. nov. (Acari: Heterostigmata: Pygmephoridae), phoretic on scarabaeid dung beetles (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3919 (1): 100-110, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3919.1.5
